about_the_game:
A look behind the mind of the Schwarz family. Experience trying to woo Rald's father in this additional DLC.

Purchasing and installing this DLC will unlock Rudolf Schwarz on the map around the middle of the game. 

  • New Heart Events related to Rald's father

  • Extra CG at the end of completing the Heart Event

To access him: 

  • Wait until the Park appears in the second map

  •  Wait until after midway to the game

Starting from there, you can give gifts and hang out with Sir Schwarz like you do with the other boys!

His Heart Events ONLY trigger at NIGHT.  So Hangouts in the Day Time will not lead to any events.

This DLC includes a CG Set and interactions with him in-game.

NOTE:

This does not affect your ending, but will change some dialogue in the game when you've started seeing him.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

For best experience, try starting a new game after having the DLC.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC contains the following situations between two consenting adult characters.

- Mild BDSM (involving constriction or tying up)
- Sexually Abusive Language in the context of Sexual Play

If this is not comfortable for the player, please refrain from purchasing this product.

detailed_description:
A look behind the mind of the Schwarz family. Experience trying to woo Rald's father in this additional DLC.

Purchasing and installing this DLC will unlock Rudolf Schwarz on the map around the middle of the game. 

  • New Heart Events related to Rald's father

  • Extra CG at the end of completing the Heart Event

To access him: 

  • Wait until the Park appears in the second map

  •  Wait until after midway to the game

Starting from there, you can give gifts and hang out with Sir Schwarz like you do with the other boys!

His Heart Events ONLY trigger at NIGHT.  So Hangouts in the Day Time will not lead to any events.

This DLC includes a CG Set and interactions with him in-game.

NOTE:

This does not affect your ending, but will change some dialogue in the game when you've started seeing him.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

For best experience, try starting a new game after having the DLC.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 13 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 13 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 13 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
